root.text: In this competitive world – one of the important qualities to have, in business, or in any other field to move ahead swiftly – is the ability to present well.The paper presentation is where the students can share their knowledge and improvise their communication skill. This platform has been set to listen to your words. Speak clearly, if you speak at all. Prepare a presentation and unleash the speaker in you to grab exciting prizes!

text: Evolution and improvement of ARM architecture.
Fuzzy logic control for complex systems.
The decision of the judges will be final and will not be subjected to any further discussions
Abstract sent after deadline will not be accepted on any cause.

root.text: ROUND WISE DESCRIPTION OF THE EVENT

text: Team can have a maximum of 3members(minimum 2 members).
You are free to select topics from the list of general ideas listed.
The abstract should not exceed 200 words.
Selected teams after scrutiny will be intimated through their respective mail id.
Details of the team members: Name, Department, Email id, Contact Number and Institution name should be sent along with abstract/video.
Deadline for submission: On or before 10/02/2020
